message: I propose a fair split, 95% for me and 5% for you. Let's get this done quickly.
You're being greedy, I'll give you a tiny share, but you'll have to wait a bit longer.
I'm willing to compromise. Let's split it 80/20. This is my final offer.
You're still being too generous, I'll take a bit more, but I'll give you something.

I'm lowering my share again, but this is the last offer I'm making. If you want to continue playing, I'm happy to let you make the next proposal, but the inflation will continue to eat away at the money.
I'm not afraid of the inflation, I'll take a bit more, you're getting desperate.
This is my final offer. I'm willing to compromise, but I'm not giving in to your demands anymore. We're both losing money with every round, and I'm not going to let you take advantage of me.
You're getting close to giving in, but I'll take a bit more, I'm not done yet.
We are both running out of time. Let's just split it evenly and be done with it. This is my final offer.
